definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: skip about (NH Pi. Hiph. = BH; so Aram. [[רְקַד]] Pa., rqod Pa.; As. raḳâdu, skip, dance;, Ar.raqada IX. run with leaps and bounds, raqada0nun leaping up briskly);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: skip about, Pf. 3 mpl. [[רָֽקְדוּ]] Ps 114:4 (of mts., [[כְּאֵילִים]]); Impf. 2 mpl. [[תִּרְקְדוּ]] v:Ps 114:6 (id.; both of Sinai quaking at law-giving); Inf. cstr. [[עֵת רְקוֹד]] Ec 3:4 a time to mourn ([[סְפׂד]]), and a time to skip about (gaily).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: dance, leap: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יְרַקְּדוּ]] Is 13:21 (of [[שְׂעִירִים]]); [[יְרַקֵּרָוּן]] Job 21:11 (of children; merrily), Jn 2:5 (of locusts); Pt. [[מְרַקֵּד]] 1Ch 15:29 (of David; = [[מְכַרְכֵּר]], [[מְפַזֵּז]], in ‖ 2Sa 6:14, 2Sa 6:16); fs. [[מְרַקֵּדָה]] Na 3:2 (of jolting chariots); in 2Sa 6:21 a ins. [[אֲרַקֵּד]] I will dance, after ´[[לִפְנֵי י]]:, LXX Th We Dr Bu HPS ([[מְרַקֵּד]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[וַיַּרְקִידֵם]] Ps 29:6 he (´[[י]]:) made them skip like calves (trees, by lightning).
